summary: The diff shows only metadata changes (project_state.json) and a truncated backend file. The truncated backend/main.mo does not contain evidence of adding a specific principal to the admin list or any admin initialization logic. No frontend changes are shown. Both requirements appear unimplemented based on available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the currently logged-in user's principal ID to the list of admin principals in the backend
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo diff is truncated and shows only existing access control patterns (isAdmin checks, hasPermission calls). No code is visible that adds a specific principal to the admin list, nor any initialization logic that would add the current user as an admin.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the Admin Panel section becomes visible in the Settings screen after the user's principal is added as admin
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files (SettingsAboutScreen, useAdminRole hook, or any React/UI components) are present in the diff. Without frontend changes, the Admin Panel visibility cannot be verified.
